Hi:
I have a question. It states in the specs of the contest that the short story can exceed 3,000 words but I would like to know just how much can it exceed?
 
Thanks,
Rod
 
Kitsuno <samurai-listowner@...> wrote:

I have clarified the rules a bit:
http://www.samurai-archives.com/writcon.html

There are 12 days left to enter the contest (deadline 3/17/05), and 
3 more weeks to complete the fiction submissions (deadline 4/1/05).  
I am considering pushing up the entrance deadline a bit, but for the 
moment, it is set at 3/17/05.  

The current prize is $36, as of 3/5/05.

Thanks
